name: Giant Walrus

trait.name: Hold Breath
text: The walrus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The walrus makes two attacks: one with its body flop and one with its tusks.

action.name: Body Flop
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Tusks
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (3d6 + 6) piercing damage.

description:
Giant walruses are enormous, ill-tempered creatures as big as elephants. A typical adult specimen weighs at least 12,000 pounds.
Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden p. 312
